B0112DB3B26547478304C19A1ECFDA36.description: Creativity: The student is willing to step outside of their comfort zone, to take a risk on trying new things, and generate work unique to them.

68C92F982BEE43EB8939BC4EAD07FCD9.description: Curiosity: The student is constantly seeking deeper understanding, is always asking why, and is unwilling to accept an easy answer.

D66402558A4C4E69A802A3C72E21C50C.description: Striving for Precision and Accuracy: The student works towards high standards, revising and reworking, striving for constant improvement.

300FDB7F93A14EF7AD535EBAB200645F.description: Flexibility and Empathy: The student is able to see things from many points of view, generate alternatives,  and consider many options.

1DD9F9B34CEE4C449C9FA530F707FDC5.description: Self-monitoring and Persistence: The student sets clear goals, establishes an organized plan, works diligently and never gives up.

EC49EDD280504EE386D1799DF83D4FC0.description: Proof, Evidence and Argumentation: The Student Utilizes recognized forms of reasoning to construct arguments based on available evidence to explain and support perspectives on a topic or issue. When challenged, the student logically refutes or accepts critiques.

248684B43D364C55AE207F3675A13721.description: Analysis and Problem Solving:The Student uses various types of resources and strategies to successfully find a connection and/or solution. Seeks teachers help when needed
